TopicTitle: Expandable base mod that isn't MKS

Articles.Content: I'm looking for an expandable base mod that isn't MKS. I'm looking for something a bit more simple, but would like some inflatable parts that work as habitats mostly.

> 
> Porkjets habitats pack? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What he said. But wait because he's coming out with a new version sometime. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I'm looking for an expandable base mod that isn't MKS. I'm looking for something a bit more simple, but would like some inflatable parts that work as habitats mostly.

There is also Pathfinder if your looking for ground base inflatable parts [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122484-WIP-1-0-4-Pathfinder-Move-in-Look-around-Move-on-0-1-4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122484-WIP-1-0-4-Pathfinder-Move-in-Look-around-Move-on-0-1-4)

And you also can stripe MKS MODULE's out and make your own do what ever.

there is this also the amazing PvPmod 

> ![remorque-tente-pliante-velo-2.jpg](http://www.avantjetaisriche.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/remorque-tente-pliante-velo-2.jpg)

> with an inflatable rescue ship in option
